events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on May 1st causing front-end damage to the car.
The claim has been classified under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and damage pictures.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the customer's case for better support.
Acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and confirmed that the investigation process will begin soon.
Request sent to customer for the police report and photos of the vehicle damage related to the accident.
Customer has successfully submitted all required documentation including accident report and repair estimates.
Investigation into the collision circumstances has commenced to assess liability and verify damages.
Investigation concluded confirming coverage with no discrepancies found in the submitted information.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the approved damage repair cost and policy terms.
Customer responded positively, agreeing to the proposed settlement amount and appreciating quick resolution.
The auto accident claim has been officially approved according to policy coverage and submitted evidence.
Payment for the claim has been issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account without delays.
The claim process is complete and the case has been closed following full settlement and payment processing.
All relevant files and documents related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for record.
